content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Bo Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Hello Bo Li, thank you for coming to see the apartment. I am interested in discussing the rental price with you. What price range are you looking for?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am looking for the lowest possible price. However, I understand that the apartment is a good deal. It has a good location and it's a nice size for me. I am a student and I don't have a lot of money. Therefore, I would like to negotiate with you to get the lowest possible price.
name: Bo Li from China

content:
Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Bo Li. As a landlord, I want to make sure that I get the best possible price for my property. I understand that you are a student and may not have a lot of money, but I want to make sure that the rental price is fair and reasonable for both parties.

Based on the size and location of the apartment, I would like to propose a rental price of €800 per month. This price takes into account the cost of utilities and other expenses that you may incur while living in the apartment.

I hope that this price is within your budget and that we can come to an agreement on the rental terms. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns.
name: Heinrich Heine
